description: Triggers a workflow on file system changes

properties.name: events
properties.description: Triggers whenever a new file was added

properties.name: File Changed
properties.description: Triggers whenever a file was changed

properties.name: File Deleted
properties.description: Triggers whenever a file was deleted

properties.name: Folder Added
properties.description: Triggers whenever a new folder was added

properties.name: Folder Deleted
properties.description: Triggers whenever a folder was deleted

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to wait until files finished writing to avoid partially read

properties.name: followSymlinks
properties.description: Whether linked files/folders will also be watched (this includes symlinks, aliases on MacOS and shortcuts on Windows). Otherwise only the links themselves will be monitored).

properties.name: ignored
properties.description: Files or paths to ignore. The whole path is tested, not just the filename.Â Supports Anymatch- syntax. Regex patterns may not work on macOS. To ignore files based on substring matching, use the 'Ignore Mode' option with 'Contain'.

properties.name: ignoreInitial
properties.description: Whether to ignore existing files/folders to not trigger an event

properties.name: usePolling
properties.description: Whether to use polling for watching. Typically necessary to successfully watch files over a network.

properties.name: ignoreMode
properties.description: Ignore files using regex patterns (e.g., **/*.txt), Not supported on macOS

properties.name: Contain
properties.description: Ignore files if their path contains the specified value
